introduction: I am a two-year academic master' student from SEIEE of Shanghai Jiao Tong University (SJTU), supervised by Prof. Dong Wang. I received my B.S. degree from the SDCS of Sun Yat-Sen University (SYSU). My reseach interest lies in data mining, especially for information retrival and recommendation algorithm. I focus on leveraging the social relation and temporal information to improve the performance of recommendation and clustering

education.school: Shanghai Jiao Tong University (SJTU), Shanghai, China

news.content: Our paper "Extracting Attentive Social Temporal Excitation for Sequential Recommendation" has been accepted by CIKM 2021.
Our paper "AIRec: Attentive intersection model for tag-aware recommendation" has been accepted by Neurocomputing after a cycle of revisions.
Start to pursue for my Master degree in SJTU
Finished internship at JY Asset Management Ltd.

project.name: Localization
project.intro: Analyze the features of RFID signals and design robust indoor localization to locate RFID tags accurately. We propose deep learning enhance holography (DLEH) to design adaptive localization model by combing RFID based synthetic aperture radar (SAR) and convolutional neural network (CNN). We also introduce compress sensing algorithms into RFID localization.
